name: __SkeletalMeshOptimizationType
doc: Enum specifying the reduction type to use when simplifying skeletal meshes with Simmplygon

SMOT_NumOfTriangles: Triangle requirement will be used for simplification.
SMOT_MaxDeviation: Accuracy requirement will be used for simplification.
SMOT_TriangleOrDeviation: Simplification will continue until either Triangle or Accuracy requirement is met.
